name: GB Save The Roots
description:
The world is facing a very dire crisis and they turn to world tree to help them but unfortunately, they find the world tree in a dire threat. Green Bean a.k.a GB an agent from a team of scientists, trying to revive a world tree by injecting herself into the roots of the world tree to solve the problem from the inside.

This game prototype is a game that our team created during GGJ 2023. Our team members are:

  • Developer: muzakkiha (https://muzakkiha.itch.io/) & Josh (https://joshia-t.itch.io/)
  • Design: me & xxinonames (https://www.instagram.com/xxinonames/)

Control:

  • Movement: WSAD
  • Shoot: LMB (Left mouse button)
  • Dodge: Left Shift

Thank you & have fun trying our little prototype!!
